items.title: How to Download Data as CSV File in .NET API

fields.title: How to Read Data From Csv API Response

inboundReferences.contextLine: If you have an API endpoint that returns a CSV file (as explained in [[how-to-download-data-as-csv-file]]), you can read it by first **installing the CsvHelper NuGet package**, and then by reading the HTTP response content:

How to Download Data as CSV File in .NET API
